Posts.Content: May 1, 2009 06:13AM susangg wrote: Day after found lump in September 08 took off the hormone patch. HAd ovaries out in 2006.  Hormonal havoc began with emotional rollercoaster of Dx.  No chem. Finished6 weeks rads march 27 and started armidex April 8th...and STILL tired.  Some days walking is an effort, but other days much better.  Try to exercise when I can..walk a mile in hilly area holding 3lb waits.  I hope the good days are more frequent. The tired days I am ready to quit the arimidex.. except I don't know what the fatigue is...really the rads or the arimidex!!! before Dx I ran 3.5 miles 2/week.  One day I will get back there.  But I think I am being double hit on the estrogen with patch removal and arimidex.. I have gained about 6 pounds...
Posts.Title: RADIATION FATIGUE - POLL bluejay1 Siciliana
